channel.title: Contents on A techie blog!
channel.description: Recent content in Contents on A techie blog!

item.title: about
item.description: I am currently working as a Lead Software Developer at BXBDigital, a Brambles company. I have keen interest in core computer science concepts like Compiler Design, Data Structures, Algorithms, Data Mining, Distributed Computing and Machine Learning. I have completed my masters in Computer Sciences from University of Delaware. During the course of my masters I was a part-time mobile application developer and later a research assistant under Dr Pollock Lori on a cloud based NSF(National Science Foundation) funded project.
